#Text=Gunman opens fire in El Paso , Texas superstore ; more than 20 dead
#Text=Thursday , August 8 , 2019
#Text=Location of the Walmart store where the shooting took place .

#Text=On Saturday morning , a gunman shot shoppers at a Walmart store in the U.S. border city of El Paso , Texas , with the death toll rising to 22 people on Monday , reported officials , with 25 others injured .
#Text=Police said the suspected gunman surrendered himself to police after being confronted by officers .
#Text=The shooting began at 10:39 a.m. local time ( 1639 UTC ) , according to police , who said officers arrived at the Walmart six minutes later .
#Text=State prosecutors charged the suspect in the shooting with capital murder , they said Sunday — murder carrying the possibility of the death penalty .
#Text=Federal authorities are investigating the shooting as domestic terrorism , according to prosecutor Josh Bash , the U.S. Attorney for the Western District of Texas .
#Text=Bash characterized the attack as " designed to intimidate a civilian population , to say the least .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text= We are treating it as a domestic terrorism case , and we 're going to do what we do to terrorists in this country , which is deliver swift and certain justice , " said Bash .

column1: #Text=Charges of domestic terrorism also carry a possible death penalty at the federal level .

#Text=The Walmart , by the Cielo Vista Mall , where the shooting happened is roughly five miles ( eight kilometers ) from the U.S. – Mexico border crossing between El Paso and Ciudad Juárez , Mexico , separated by the Rio Grande .
#Text=According to Mexican President Andrés Manuel López Obrador , six Mexican nationals were killed in the attack , and seven more were injured .
#Text=Another report from the Mexican government during the weekend said eight Mexicans died in the attack .
#Text=Mexico 's Foreign Secretary Marcelo Ebrard said the Mexican government would pressure the U.S. government to provide better protections for Mexicans in the United States .
#Text=The foreign minister said Mexico would consider charging the gunman with terrorism against Mexicans and would seek to extradite the gunman to face charges in Mexico .
#Text=Ebrard said , " As far as I know , this would be the first case of this type in history " , adding , " For Mexico , this individual is a terrorist " .
#Text=U.S. officials identified the suspect as 21-year-old Patrick Crusius of Allen , Texas , near the city of Dallas .
#Text=According to the El Paso mayor , Dee Margo , during the weekend , police were investigating whether a manifesto posted online to the message board 8chan was written by the suspect .
#Text=In the document , the writer supposes a " cultural and ethnic replacement brought on by an invasion " of Hispanic people into the United States .

#Text=According to U.S. Attorney Bash , the manifesto if written by the suspect could strengthen the federal government 's case : " The key factor here is that it appears to be an intent to coerce or intimidate a civilian population[ ... ]

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=El Paso 's police chief Greg Allen said late Sunday the police were attributing authorship of the document to Crusius .

#Text=According to data from the Gun Violence Archive , the shooting followed four deadly mass shootings in the United States that week , including one in California at a garlic festival in Gilroy , killing three , and another in Chippewa Falls , Wisconsin where at least five died .
